summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Student Management System (EduManager). Both backend and frontend are highly functional with excellent success rates. All major features tested successfully including admin authentication, student management with age calculation, gradebook functionality, and report card generation.

flaky_endpoints.issue: User deletion returns 401 during cleanup when token expires
flaky_endpoints.impact: Minor - only affects cleanup operations, not core functionality

passed_tests: ✅ Admin registration and login - working perfectly
✅ Admin can see all navigation items (Dashboard, Students, Classes, Attendance, Gradebook, Report Cards, Users)
✅ Student management - add student with full details (first/middle/last name, DOB, house, class)
✅ Age calculation from DOB - verified working (DOB 2015-05-15 shows 10 years old)
✅ Navigation to all pages - Dashboard, Students, Gradebook, Report Cards
✅ Gradebook page with class/student selectors and subject grade entry
✅ Report Cards page with generate functionality
✅ Grading scheme endpoint returns correct grades (A+ through U)
✅ Backend API health and all CRUD operations
✅ User authentication and role-based access control
✅ Class creation and management
✅ Student CRUD operations with age calculation
✅ Gradebook entry with multiple subjects and grading
✅ Report card generation for entire class with positioning
✅ Dashboard statistics and data display
✅ All reference data endpoints (subjects, houses, grading scheme)
✅ Frontend registration and login flow
✅ Role-based navigation rendering
✅ Student cards display with proper information
✅ Form validation and data entry

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all navigation, forms, and core functionality working)
